title: Elden Ring
author: Miyazaki
description: Elden Ring[a] is a 2022 action role-playing game developed by FromSoftware. It was directed by Hidetaka Miyazaki with worldbuilding provided by fantasy writer George R. R. Martin.

title: FIFA 23
author: nadie
description: FIFA 23 is a football video game published by Electronic Arts (or simply EA). It is the 30th installment in the FIFA series that is developed by EA Sports

title: Uncharted 4
author: nose
description: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End is a 2016 action-adventure game developed by Naughty Dog and published by Sony Computer Entertainment
